Title: Directs the department of financial services to conduct a comprehensive study on how the department of financial services may create a compensation system commensurate with the federal compensation system
Summary: Directs the department of financial services to conduct a comprehensive study on how the department of financial services may create a compensation system commensurate with the compensation systems of similar federal financial regulators and to issue a report of its findings.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the department of financial services, in consultation with the office of employee relations and the department of civil service, to conduct a comprehensive study on how the department of financial services may create a compensation system commensurate with the compensation system of similar federal financial regulators
